alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Grant; La Salle; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 11:46AM CDT until May 11 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Grant Parish in north central Louisiana... Southern Caldwell Parish in north central Louisiana... Northern La Salle Parish in north central Louisiana... East central Winn Parish in north central Louisiana... * Until 1230 PM CDT. * At 1146 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Columbia to 6 miles west of Rosefield, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Jena, Olla, Clarks, Grayson, Midway, Urania, Tullos, Georgetown, Spaulding, Standard, Rochelle, Kelly, Zenoria and Burlington. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for north central Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for north central Louisiana.
